# se-breadcrumb



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                           | Type                                      | Default        |
| --------------- | ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `ariaLabel`     | `aria-label`      | Provides a label that describes the type of navigation for assistive technologies. The default value is `breadcrumb`. | `string`                                  | `'breadcrumb'` |
| `breakpoint`    | `breakpoint`      | Setting allowing to transform breadcrumb into a backlink on screen sizes smaller than specified.                      | `"desktop" \| "tablet" \| "wide-desktop"` | `undefined`    |
| `canSelectLast` | `can-select-last` | Indicates whether or not the last breadcrumb item should be selectable. The default setting is `false`.               | `boolean`                                 | `false`        |
